eu.casoftworks.jdroidlib.device

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.casoftworks.jdroidlib.device.Device
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDevice

    public class Device
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDevice
    Represents a physical device.
    Author:
    Simon Cahill

      • getSerialNumber

        public java.lang.String getSerialNumber()
        Gets the device's serial number (as seen by ADB). This method will return null if the device is connected via TCP/IP!
        Returns:
        The device's serial number as seen by ADB.

      • getIpAddress

        public Ip4Address getIpAddress()
        Gets the device's IP address (and port). This method will return null if the device is connected via TCP/IP!
        Returns:
        The device's IPv4 address and port.

      • isConnectedViaTcpIp

        public boolean isConnectedViaTcpIp()
        Gets a value indicating whether this device is connected to the host via TCP/IP or not.
        Returns:
        true if the device is connected via TCP/IP. false otherwise.

        public boolean hasRoot()
